alert.note: Alert for Cass; Henry; Johnson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 25 at 6:32AM CST until December 26 at 3:20PM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri... Big Creek at Blairstown affecting Henry, Cass and Johnson MO Counties. For the Big Creek...including Blairstown...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Creek at Blairstown. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, The west bank of the creek begins to flood. At 23.0 feet, Flooding occurs at the west approach to the N Highway bridge located 0.2 miles west of Blairstown. Flooding also occurs across B Highway near Big Creek which is several miles northwest of Blairstown. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 AM CST Monday the stage was 19.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 20.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 21.0 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/.
